div.head: Description of changes for 2012.12
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne manuscript is still pending. Corrections and additions will be made after a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses is completed. Cross-references, citations, and a critical apparatus still need to be constructed. . Troublesome transcriptions have been tagged as "unclear" in the edited transcription.
